ygData.subject: Planning
ygData.msgSnippet: We really need more support classes.5 tanks(and strangely enough, most are paladins) out of 9 people is not a balance group and Leshrac is playing the only
ygData.messageBody:
We really need more support classes.5 tanks(and strangely enough, most
are paladins) out of 9 people is not a balance group and Leshrac is
playing the only evil character in the whole group.

If more tanks are created, I might change class to a druid or shaman

Also, someone mind playing an evil character to support Leshrac?

Again, I ask you people to state the time/how frequent you play. In
addition, mind tellling me which trade skills you are persuding?

The reason I asked about trade skills is to reduce the amount of money
the whole group needs to spend in the long term before we can get useful
stuff like armor from the skills.

Additional Info

Name Time played How often Trade skill
Kelvyn 2pm to 12am, with Daily, at least Baking or
tailoring
regular breaks in until school
between reopens
